query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `releases` (
  `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `artistId` int NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(500) NOT NULL,
  `titleLanguage` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'en',
  `subtitle` varchar(500),
  `releaseType` enum('album','single','ep','compilation','soundtrack','mixtape','live','remix','ringtone','other') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'single',
  `status` enum('draft','ready','submitted','distributed','takedown') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft',
  `upc` varchar(20),
  `ean` varchar(20),
  `grid` varchar(30),
  `proprietaryId` varchar(100),
  `pLineYear` smallint,
  `pLineOwner` varchar(500),
  `cLineYear` smallint,
  `cLineOwner` varchar(500),
  `labelName` varchar(500),
  `primaryGenre` varchar(100),
  `secondaryGenre` varchar(100),
  `parentalWarning` enum('NotExplicit','Explicit','ExplicitContentEdited') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'NotExplicit',
  `originalReleaseDate` date,
  `globalReleaseDate` date,
  `preSaveDate` date,
  `boptonePremiereDays` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `displayArtistName` varchar(500),
  `displayArtistRole` enum('MainArtist','FeaturedArtist','Remixer','Composer','Conductor','Orchestra','Ensemble','Actor','Dancer','DJ','Narrator','Unknown') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'MainArtist',
  `featuredArtists` json,
  `artworkUrl` varchar(2048),
  `artworkS3Key` varchar(1024),
  `description` text,
  `notes` text,
  `ddexDeliveryId` varchar(100),
  `ddexLastDeliveredAt` timestamp,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `idx_releases_artistId` (`artistId`),
  INDEX `idx_releases_status` (`status`),
  INDEX `idx_releases_upc` (`upc`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `releaseTracks` (
  `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `releaseId` int NOT NULL,
  `trackId` int NOT NULL,
  `discNumber` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `sequenceNumber` smallint NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `isBonus` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `isHidden` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `addedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `idx_releaseTracks_releaseId` (`releaseId`),
  INDEX `idx_releaseTracks_trackId` (`trackId`),
  UNIQUE KEY `uq_release_track` (`releaseId`, `trackId`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `releaseTerritoryDeals` (
  `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `releaseId` int NOT NULL,
  `territory` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'worldwide',
  `pricingTier` enum('free','standard','premium') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'standard',
  `streamingRights` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `downloadRights` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `syncRights` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `startDate` date,
  `endDate` date,
  `priceOverride` decimal(8,2),
  `currency` varchar(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'USD',
  `notes` varchar(500),
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `idx_territoryDeals_releaseId` (`releaseId`),
  UNIQUE KEY `uq_release_territory` (`releaseId`, `territory`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2SKEMaxYovcAzrR.root --database nTbKjjzazhRpeJn9kKuXdQ --execute
